title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery                    Fort Stevens 150th   7 Photos  Images from the 150th Anniversary of the Battle of Fort Stevens.          Civil War Washington   24 Photos  These photos are found in the Library of Congress. They are pictures of the soldiers and citizens in Washington area during and after the Civil War.          More Civil War Washington   35 Photos  Photographs and other information from the Library of Congress and National Archives.
